title: Career Impact
content: Graduates of the Applied Bachelor's in Land Transportation Management program have broad career opportunities in the transportation sector. They can work in government agencies such as transportation departments, logistics companies, public transportation operators, or as land transportation consultants. With managerial skills, data analysis capabilities, and a deep understanding of transportation regulations and technologies, graduates play an important role in developing safe, efficient, and sustainable transportation systems. The competencies gained also provide opportunities for higher career advancement in both public and private sectors, at national and international levels.
